title: 2 WONDERFUL T206's -GEO. STONE & ED REULBACH SGC 40 VG 3!
author: GoldenAge50s

posts.post_title: 2 WONDERFUL T206's -GEO. STONE & ED REULBACH SGC 40 VG 3!
posts.post_content:
Offering a pair of FANTASTIC LOOKING T206'S from the Roy Mellinger Collection to NET 54 members before I put them on EBay. (getting to the end of this GREAT run of cards!)

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=t206[/url]

(1) GEORGE STONE PORTRAIT SC150/30 SGC 40 VG 3!

An EXQUISITE example w/ GORGEOUS COLOR & CONTRAST--EYE APPEAL 2nd to NONE! PURE WHITE BORDERS & NR PERFECT CENTERING! SPOTLESS w/ all the qualities of a 6 or 7! $89 DELIVERED

(2) ED REULBACH GLOVE SHOWING P150/25 SGC 40 VG 3!

A TREMENDOUS example w/ DEEP RICH COLOR & ULTRA-CLEAR CONTRAST! SNOW WHITE BORDERS w/ virtually SPOTLESS F & B--WELL-DEFINED CORNERS & WELL CENTERED! A PREMIER T206! $94 DELIVERED


Both of these cards belong in your Fine Collection!
Time for a boost for these BEAUTIES!
